Package org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.powershell

Class PoshUtils

java.lang.Object
org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.powershell.PoshUtils
public class PoshUtils extends Object
Represents a container for PowerShell-related utility methods.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Pattern
    GOTO_LABEL
    Matches a PowerShell break or continue statement with word label.
    static final Pattern
    MAYBE_END_MULTILINE_COMMENT
    Matches either the end of a PowerShell multiple-line comment or a superfluous right angle bracket (which is not a valid BrowseableURI character) captured in order to be able to detect the end of a PowerShell multiple-line comment.
    static final Pattern
    STRINGLITERAL_APOS_DELIMITER
    Matches an apostrophe that is not¹ part of a Microsoft-style apostrophe escape sequence:

  • Method Summary

  • Field Details

    • STRINGLITERAL_APOS_DELIMITER

      public static final Pattern STRINGLITERAL_APOS_DELIMITER
      Matches an apostrophe that is not¹ part of a Microsoft-style apostrophe escape sequence: 
       
 \'((?<=^.(?!\'))|(?<=[^\'].(?!\'))|(?<=^(\'\'){1,3}.(?!\'))|(?<=[^\'](\'\'){1,3}.(?!\')))
      (Edit above and paste below [in NetBeans] for easy String escaping.)

      ¹Correctness in a long sequence of apostrophes is limited because Java look-behind is not variable length but instead must have a definite upper bound in the regex definition.

    • MAYBE_END_MULTILINE_COMMENT

      public static final Pattern MAYBE_END_MULTILINE_COMMENT
      Matches either the end of a PowerShell multiple-line comment or a superfluous right angle bracket (which is not a valid BrowseableURI character) captured in order to be able to detect the end of a PowerShell multiple-line comment.

    • GOTO_LABEL

      public static final Pattern GOTO_LABEL
      Matches a PowerShell break or continue statement with word label.
